name: "Papa Cloudy's Laundromat" Pictrue Book
description: Papa Cloudy is a working class cloud with occasional odd jobs. People bring their hearts to the laundromat to be cleaned and mended by Papa Cloudy. He finds a broken heart in his laundry pile, and because he's a gentle cloud he becomes sad and cries. It rains whenever he sheds tears because he's a cloud. Papa Cloudy sews the broken heart pieces back together and is happy again. Watch the animation of the book https://vimeo.com/38537940 22 pages full color 6.5"x6.5" check out the preview on blurb. ( but don't buy there!) http://www.blurb.com/books/3457035

name: "Papa Cloudy's Desert" Picture Book
description: Papa Cloudy is hired to make rain in the desert because he's a cloud. But it's hard to make rain in the desert, so Papa Cloudy uses a special skill, his rain dance. His attempts are not very successful but he enjoys watching the beautiful moon grow each night. When the moon becomes full, he discovers it is actually a heart. But when the heart moon is hidden by a dark cloud, Papa Cloudy falls asleep crying. In the morning he wakes up and finds hearts are blooming from cacti everywhere. 32 Pages Full color Picture book 6.5"x6.5" Watch the animation of the book https://vimeo.com/44808728 Preview the entire book on blurb: http://www.blurb.com/books/3372264

name: "Papa Cloudy's Sea of Love" Picture Book
description: Papa Cloudy keeps his heart in a fishing tank. But his heart looks lonely without a companion. So Papa Cloudy goes to sea to find a friend for his heart. He puts his heart on a fishing pole as a lure, then throws it into the ocean and waits to see if he'll make a great catch. He gets threatened by sharks and is pinched by a mischievous crab. In the end Papa Cloudy's heart finds true love. The two hearts live in his fish tank happily ever after. Watch the animation of the book https://vimeo.com/40432925 32 Pages Full color Picture book 6.5"x6.5" Preview the entire book: http://www.blurb.com/books/3373867
